--- title: "It me" author: "Ian" categories: [funy] image: "DDR Frieden Bruecke.jpg" --- This is a post with executable code (maybe) Fun youtube video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dQw4w9WgXcQ ::: {#2207eb99 .cell execution_count=1} ``` {.python .cell-code} import matplotlib.pyplot as plt import numpy as np import pandas as pd import statistics x = np.array([10, 8, 13, 9, 11, 14, 6, 4, 12, 7, 5]) y1 = np.array([8.04, 6.95, 7.58, 8.81, 8.33, 9.96, 7.24, 4.26, 10.84, 4.82, 5.68]) y2 = np.array([9.14, 8.14, 8.74, 8.77, 9.26, 8.10, 6.13, 3.10, 9.13, 7.26, 4.74]) y3 = np.array([7.46, 6.77, 12.74, 7.11, 7.81, 8.84, 6.08, 5.39, 8.15, 6.42, 5.73]) x4 = np.array([8, 8, 8, 8, 8, 8, 8, 19, 8, 8, 8]) y4 = np.array([6.58, 5.76, 7.71, 8.84, 8.47, 7.04, 5.25, 12.50, 5.56, 7.91, 6.89]) xmean=np.mean(x) x4mean=np.mean(x4) y1var=statistics.variance(y1) y2var=statistics.variance(y2) y3var=statistics.variance(y3) y4var=statistics.variance(y4) y1mean=np.mean(y1) y2mean=np.mean(y2) y3mean=np.mean(y3) y4mean=np.mean(y4) data = {'Set':[1,2,3,4], 'X Mean': [x4mean, x4mean, x4mean, x4mean], 'Y Variances': [y1var,y2var,y3var,y4var], 'Y Means':[y1mean,y2mean,y3mean,y4mean]} df = pd.DataFrame(data) #print(df) #Regressions m1,b1=np.polyfit(x,y1,1) m2,b2=np.polyfit(x,y2,1) m3,b3=np.polyfit(x,y3,1) m4,b4=np.polyfit(x4,y4,1) xl=np.arange(20) plt.subplot(2,2,1) plt.plot(x,y1,'.',c="blue",label=r'$\mu$ = 7.5') plt.plot(x,y1,'.',c="blue",label=r'$\sigma ^2$ = 4.127') plt.plot(x,m1*x+b1,color='red') plt.legend(loc="lower right") plt.ylim(4, 11) plt.show() plt.subplot(2,2,2) plt.plot(x,y2,'.',c="blue",label=r'$\mu$ = 7.5') plt.plot(x,y2,'.',c="blue",label=r'$\sigma ^2$ = 4.127') plt.plot(x,m2*x+b2,color='red') plt.legend(loc="lower right") plt.ylim(4, 11) plt.show() plt.subplot(2,2,3) plt.plot(x,y3,'.',c="blue",label=r'$\mu$ = 7.5') plt.plot(x,y3,'.',c="blue",label=r'$\sigma ^2$ = 4.123') plt.plot(x,m3*x+b3,color='red') plt.legend(loc="lower right") plt.ylim(4, 11) plt.show() plt.subplot(2,2,4) plt.xlim(7,20) plt.plot(x4,y4,'.',c="blue",label=r'$\mu$ = 7.5') plt.plot(x4,y4,'.',c="blue",label=r'$\sigma ^2$ = 4.123') plt.plot(0.4999*xl+3.0017,color='red') plt.legend(loc="lower right") plt.ylim(5, 13) plt.show() pd.melt(df, id_vars=None, value_vars=None, var_name=None, value_name='value', col_level=None, ignore_index=True) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ![](index_files/figure-html/cell-2-output-1.png){width=282 height=210} ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display}
